Hi,

How can i find the objects within a given distance to given coordinate?

M. Hararci

var objectsInArea = from p in objects
                             where GMaps.Instance.GetDistance(center, p.Point) <= areaRadius
                             select new
                             {
                                Obj = p,
                                Dist = GMaps.Instance.GetDistance(center, p.Point)
                             };
         if(objectsInArea.Any())
         {
                     ....

Thanks for fast reply.  I try it but I don't worked. 

Error	1	Could not find an implementation of the query pattern for source type 'GMap.NET.WindowsForms.GMapOverlay'.  'Where' not found.	F:\greatmaps\Demo.WindowsForms\Forms\MainForm.cs	508	43	Demo.WindowsForms
Pardon me. I didn't check the framework of the demo application. Changing the target framework of the application and it works. That's great. Thanks for helping.
